item.title: Actual Performance Window
item.description: Actual Performance Window # Actual Performance Window is a window to see Performance Rank of your Avatar in Play Mode or just after building your avatar without launching your VRChat Client. If you have some non-destructive avatar modification tools you can preview on entering Play Mode such as Avatar Optimizer or Modular Avatar, You can see performance rank in Play Mode preview. If you have multiple avatars in your scene, You can select avatar to see performance rank at the top of the window.
